Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


Rate constants were derived by making kinetic binding measurements at ten different antigen concentrations ranging from 10 - 200 nM.
The association and dissociation rate constants, Ic<sub>0n</sub> (unit M<sup>-1</sup>S<sup>"1</sup>) and k<sub>off</sub> (unit s<sup>"1</sup>) were determined under a continuous flow rate of 25 μl/min.
In this assay, on-rates as fast as 10<sup>6</sup> M <sup>1</sup>S<sup>'1</sup> and off-rates as slow as 10<sup>"6</sup> s<sup>"1</sup> can be measured.
Antibodies (50 ul) was added to a 96 well plate (1E-7 to IE-15 M final concentration) and pre-incubated with 50 ul of IL- 1.alpha (50 pg/mL final concentration) for 1 hr at 37 C, 5% CO2.
